ValidationRule.description: Check Date is required for Core Sales Reps to populate on DocuSign RAA Document.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.DeveloperName ='Core Opportunity Record Type',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Core Opportunity DSA Record Type', $User.ProfileId ='00e7000000144NI', ISNULL( Check_Date__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Primary_Competition__c, "Ancillary")), NOT(RIGHT(Name,9)="Ancillary"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Check Date is required for Core Sales Reps to populate on DocuSign RAA document.
